detailedProducts.name: Big Beef Burrito
detailedProducts.description: A generously sized burrito packed with seasoned, juicy beef, fluffy rice, tender beans, and gooey melted cheese, wrapped in a warm, soft tortilla. Perfectly balanced with a hint of spices, this hearty meal is both filling and delicious.

detailedProducts.name: Chicken Wrap
detailedProducts.description: Tender, grilled chicken breast rolled in a soft tortilla with fresh crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and a creamy, flavorful sauce. Light yet satisfying, this wrap is ideal for a quick and healthy meal on the go.

detailedProducts.name: Margherita Magic
detailedProducts.description: Classic Italian Margherita pizza featuring a perfectly baked crust, rich tomato sauce, creamy fresh mozzarella, and fragrant basil leaves. A simple yet irresistible pizza that delivers authentic Italian flavor in every bite.

detailedProducts.name: Veggie Delight
detailedProducts.description: A colorful, wholesome pizza loaded with crisp bell peppers, sweet onions, earthy olives, and tender mushrooms atop a rich, cheese-covered base. Every slice bursts with fresh, vibrant flavors for veggie lovers.

detailedProducts.name: Vegier Burger
detailedProducts.description: A hearty veggie patty grilled to perfection and served on a soft sesame bun with fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, and a tangy sauce. Deliciously satisfying, this burger is a perfect choice for a plant-based meal without compromising on taste.

detailedProducts.name: Wendy Burger
detailedProducts.description: Juicy, perfectly seasoned beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, crisp lettuce, fresh tomatoes, crunchy pickles, and house sauce, all sandwiched in a toasted bun. A classic burger experience with every bite bursting with flavor.
